titleStmt.title: Chartham news: or A brief relation of some strange bones there lately digged up in some grounds of Mr. John Somner's, of Canterbury: written by his brother, Mr. William Somner, late auditor of Christ Church Canterbury, and register of the archbishops court, there; before his death.
titleStmt.author: Somner, William, 1598-1669.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
